languages.text: "Гайки нам дурные прислали, ржавые. Вы уж разберитесь, накажите кого следует! Это ж гайки, важное дело!"
"They sent us bad nuts, all rusted. You'll sort it out, punish whoever's responsible! Nuts are a serious business, after all!"
languages.original_text: "Гайки нам дурные прислали, ржавые. Вы уж разберитесь, накажите кого следует! Это ж гайки, важное дело!"

traits.locale_text: "They sent us bad nuts, all rusted. You'll sort it out, punish whoever's responsible! Nuts are a serious business, after all!"
"They sent us bad nuts, all rusted. You'll sort it out, punish whoever's responsible! Nuts are a serious business, after all!"
"They sent us bad nuts, all rusted. You'll sort it out, punish whoever's responsible! Nuts are a serious business, after all!"
"They sent us bad nuts, all rusted. You'll sort it out, punish whoever's responsible! Nuts are a serious business, after all!"
"They sent us bad nuts, all rusted. You'll sort it out, punish whoever's responsible! Nuts are a serious business, after all!"

languages.text: «Nos han mandado tuercas defectuosas, están todas oxidadas. ¡Ponga orden y castigue al responsable! ¡Las tuercas hay que tomárselas en serio!».
languages.original_text: "They sent us bad nuts, all rusted. You'll sort it out, punish whoever's responsible! Nuts are a serious business, after all!"

traits.locale_text: «Nos han mandado tuercas defectuosas, están todas oxidadas. ¡Ponga orden y castigue al responsable! ¡Las tuercas hay que tomárselas en serio!».

languages.text: 「錆びついた悪いナッツが送られてきました。どうにか解決して、責任者を罰してくれ！ナッツの品質は重要なんだから！」
languages.original_text: "They sent us bad nuts, all rusted. You'll sort it out, punish whoever's responsible! Nuts are a serious business, after all!"

traits.locale_text: 「錆びついた悪いナッツが送られてきました。どうにか解決して、責任者を罰してくれ！ナッツの品質は重要なんだから！」

languages.text: “那些螺钉根本不能用，全生锈了。这件事情你来负责，所有涉及到的人都要严肃处理！螺钉不能用，这是件非常严重的事情！”
languages.original_text: "They sent us bad nuts, all rusted. You'll sort it out, punish whoever's responsible! Nuts are a serious business, after all!"

traits.locale_text: “那些螺钉根本不能用，全生锈了。这件事情你来负责，所有涉及到的人都要严肃处理！螺钉不能用，这是件非常严重的事情！”

languages.text: "Die haben uns rostige Muttern geschickt. Regelt das und bestraft den Schuldigen. Mit Muttern ist schließlich nicht zu spaßen!"
languages.original_text: "They sent us bad nuts, all rusted. You'll sort it out, punish whoever's responsible! Nuts are a serious business, after all!"

traits.locale_text: "Die haben uns rostige Muttern geschickt. Regelt das und bestraft den Schuldigen. Mit Muttern ist schließlich nicht zu spaßen!"

languages.text: « Les écrous qu'on nous a envoyés sont complètement rouillés. Vous devez trouver et châtier les responsables ! Après tout, on ne plaisante pas avec les écrous. »
languages.original_text: "They sent us bad nuts, all rusted. You'll sort it out, punish whoever's responsible! Nuts are a serious business, after all!"

traits.locale_text: « Les écrous qu'on nous a envoyés sont complètement rouillés. Vous devez trouver et châtier les responsables ! Après tout, on ne plaisante pas avec les écrous. »

languages.text: "Bize kalitesiz somun göndermişler, hepsi paslanmış. Bu işi çöz, sorumlusu kimse cezalandır! Sonuçta somunun şakası olmaz!"
languages.original_text: "They sent us bad nuts, all rusted. You'll sort it out, punish whoever's responsible! Nuts are a serious business, after all!"
